name: Spirit of Fire
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.

result_editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.

editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.

name: Spirit of Water
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.

result_editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.

editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.

name: Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.

result_editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.

editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.

name: Arisanna, Herbalist Prodigy
effect: On Enter: Gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
effect_raw: On Enter: gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
flavor: "Adjuvants, catalysts, and materia abound! This world offers so much potential for research and experimentation. Now, what about this mixture?"

name: Arisanna, Master Alchemist
effect: Arisanna Lineage (Arisanna, Master Alchemist must be leveled from a previous level "Arisanna" champion.) On Enter: Gather twice. Inherited Effect: At the beginning of your end phase, you may sacrifice two Herbs with the same name. If you do, draw a card.

Arisanna Lineage (Arisanna, Master Alchemist must be leveled from a previous level "Arisanna" champion.)

name: Arisanna, Astral Zenith
effect: Arisanna Lineage Once per turn, you may pay 0rather than pay a card's starcalling costs.
effect_raw:
Arisanna Lineage
Once per turn, you may pay (0) rather than pay a card's starcalling costs.

rule.description: While paying the alternative Starcalling cost, modifications to the card's reserve cost are ignored. Other additional costs such as 'as an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally', are not ignored.
You may choose to not use Arisanna's alternative starcalling cost when paying for a starcalling cost and save it for another card in that same turn.

flavor: The chosen luminary of the celestial heavens. Her advent foretells both devastation and salvation.

name: Diana, Keen Huntress
effect: Lineage Release — Materialize a Gun card from your material deck. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
effect_raw: Lineage Release — Materialize a Gun card from your material deck. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)

rule.description: You may choose to fail to find a card from your material deck to materialize.
You still pay the costs of the materialization.

flavor: A talented archer in a past life, her mastery of firearms came naturally while on Azoth.

editions.effect: Lineage Release — Materialize a Gun card from your material deck.

effect_raw: On Enter: Tonoris gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.)

effect_raw:

name: Tonoris, Genesis Aegis
effect: Tonoris Lineage At the beginning of your recollection phase, choose one that hasn’t been chosen— • Summon an Obelisk of Armaments token. • Summon an Obelisk of Fabrication token. • Summon an Obelisk of Protection token.

Tonoris Lineage
At the beginning of your recollection phase, choose one that hasn’t been chosen— 
• summon an Obelisk of Armaments token.
• summon an Obelisk of Fabrication token.
• summon an Obelisk of Protection token.

rule.description: If this card leaves the champion's lineage (by means such as deleveling), the token summoning options are reset if this card re-enters the lineage.

name: Blastshot Pump
effect: (Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.) Class BonusIf combat damage would be dealt to a unit by an attack using Blastshot Pump, that damage is dealt to that unit and an additional unit you don't control instead.
effect_raw:
(Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)
[Class Bonus] If combat damage would be dealt to a unit by an attack using Blastshot Pump, that damage is dealt to that unit and an additional unit you don't control instead.

rule.description: Blastshot Pump's replacement effect causes the attacker to deal combat damage to an additional unit. Because this damage is also considered combat damage, it can trigger On Hit effects accordingly.
The unit that is receiving damage from Blastshop Pump's replacement effect can't retaliate because damage would already have been dealt by starting the resolution of the damage step.
The attacking player that controls Blastshot Pump will choose the additional unit for the replacement effect, if applicable.
If damage is reduced before the replacement effect happens, the additional unit will take the reduced damage instead of the full damage amount.

name: Bulwark Sword
effect: Class BonusBulwark Sword gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Bulwark Sword gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.

name: Charged Manaplate
effect: Class BonusBanish Charged Manaplate: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has taken 4 or more damage this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Banish Charged Manaplate: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has taken 4 or more damage this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Crest of the Alliance
effect: Whenever a fostered ally you control dies, you may banish Crest of the Alliance. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever a fostered ally you control dies, you may banish Crest of the Alliance. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: The precarious truce across nations brokered in the face of an unstoppable force gave rise to the Alliance—humanity's final defense.

name: Flash Grenade
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Banish Flash Grenade: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to a distant unit you control, prevent 3 of that damage.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Banish Flash Grenade: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to a distant unit you control, prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Ingredient Pouch
effect: 1, : Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] (1), REST: gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
flavor: An herbalist's joy and an alchemist's treasure. Always surprising how much can actually fit inside.

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa

result_editions.flavor:
"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."

effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to materialize. Banish Necklace of Foresight: Glimpse 4. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

Banish Necklace of Foresight: Glimpse 4. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

name: Plated Bullet
effect: Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.) : Load Plated Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
effect_raw:
Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)
REST: Load Plated Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)

rule.description: While loaded into an object, if that object leaves the field, this bullet would be sent to the graveyard (or banishment if it's a regalia).

name: Powercharged Shield
effect: Banish Powercharged Shield: Target unit with taunt gains vigor until end of turn. (Units with vigor wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)
effect_raw: Banish Powercharged Shield: Target unit with taunt gains vigor until end of turn. (Units with vigor wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)
flavor: Caution: excessive alchemical kinetic conversion may cause myo-paralysis and rapid internal disintegration.

effect: Class BonusMemory 4+ Your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only there are four or more cards in your memory.) Level 4+: You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card into your memory.

[Level 4+] REST: You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card into your memory.

name: Scale of Souls
effect: Class BonusBalance — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if the amount of cards in your hand and memory are equal, recover 2. 2, : Return a card from your memory to your hand.
effect_raw:
(Class Bonus) Balance — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if the amount of cards in your hand and memory are equal, recover 2.
2, REST: Return a card from your memory to your hand.

rule.description: If the Balance condition is not met at the beginning of the controller's recollection phase, Scale of Souls won't trigger at all. This means there is no chance to fix the hand/memory to achieve Balance during the recollection phase.
Scale of Soul's Balance condition is also checked during the resolution of its triggered effect as well.

name: Synth Disrupter
effect: Banish Synth Disrupter: Until end of turn, Automaton allies enter the field rested.
effect_raw: Banish Synth Disrupter: Until end of turn, Automaton allies enter the field rested.
flavor: Repurposed in haste to jam and scramble electrical signals characteristic to automatons.

flavor:
Schedule routine maintenance examinations every two years. Do not expose to temperatures in excess of 500 degrees for prolonged periods.
— Manufacturer's Recommendations

name: Backstep
effect: Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.) Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
Draw a card.

目標單位成為遠離。
抽一張牌。

effect: Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) Imperial Recruit gets +1 as long as it's fostered.

Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.)

The Foster triggered ability will trigger even if that ally did not exist on the field for a full turn cycle.

name: Potion of Healing
effect: Brew — Two Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) Sacrifice Potion of Healing: Recover 5. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
effect_raw:
Brew — Two Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) 
Sacrifice Healing Potion: Recover 5. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

rule.description: When paying the Brew cost, modifications to the card's reserve cost is ignored. Other additional costs such as 'as an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally', is not ignored.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Healing Potion -> Potion of Healing'

釀造 — 兩個 Herbs

name: Scry the Skies
effect: Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw: Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

name: Supply Drone
effect: Class BonusAt the beginning of your recollection phase, materialize a Bullet card with memory cost 0 from your material deck. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, materialize a Bullet card with memory cost 0 from your material deck. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: You may choose to fail to find a card from your material deck to materialize.
You still pay the costs of the materialization.

flavor: Armor-plated and heat-resistant to prevent the sympathetic detonation of critical munitions.

name: Take Aim
effect: Target unit's next attack this turn gets +2. Class Bonus: That unit also gains ranged 2 until end of turn. (As long as that unit is distant, that unit's attacks get +2. Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Target unit's next attack this turn gets +2 power. Class Bonus: That unit also gains ranged 2 until end of turn. (As long as that unit is distant, that unit's attacks get +2 power. Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Take Cover
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. Target unit you control gains stealth until end of turn. That unit also becomes distant. (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight. Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)

[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.

name: Force Load
effect: Choose a fire or norm element Bullet card from your material deck with memory cost 0 and load it into target Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
effect_raw: Choose a fire or norm element Bullet card from your material deck with memory cost 0 and load it into target Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)

rule.description: When a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent. In the case of Force Load, it allows more than one Bullet cards to be loaded at once and fired at the same time.

flavor: Factory Recommendation: one round per shot.

editions.effect: 從你的素材庫選擇一張回憶代價為 0 的火屬性或無屬性 Bullet 牌，接著將其裝填至目標由你操控的 Gun weapon 中。

name: Recruitment Officer
effect: Class BonusFoster On Foster: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an ally card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Foster 
On Foster: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an ally card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

rule.description: Once this ally on the field is fostered, it can't be fostered again.
The Foster triggered ability will trigger even if that ally did not exist on the field for a full turn cycle.

name: Rousing Slam
effect: Class BonusLevel 2+ On Attack: The attacker gains vigor and taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (Units with vigor wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)

name: Astra Sight
effect: Starcalling — 0 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)Glimpse 1, then draw a card.
effect_raw: Starcalling — (0) (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)Glimpse 1, then draw a card.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.

effect: Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost.
